name: Project Planet
description:
Project Planet is developing a consumer platform that aims to engage millions of users and businesses around the world, in the fight against climate change by promoting commerce through its APP carbonquo.

The aim is to offset the entire footprint of each, individual’s daily activity, from the morning shower, breakfast coffee, the commute, shopping, lunch and beyond by driving sales through our consumer partner platform.

Project Planet
The project objective is to incorporate retail based companies from around the world, on a single commerce platform, representing all market and industry sectors, from energy providers and air travel, to fashion and high street coffee shops.

Each participating company partner will pay a % of the total outlay, that a customer chooses to spend with them, 100% of the funds obtained are invested to offset each individual’s daily carbon footprint.

Powerful marketing initiatives such as Project Planet which engage both businesses and consumers worldwide can actively avoid the catastrophic consequences of global warming, safeguarding the planet for our children and future generations.

Imagine if you will, the possibility of being able to offset everyone’s daily carbon footprint everywhere, not by imposing sanctions, levees, or taxes, but by simply giving each individual the ability to offset their own carbon footprint, through the businesses they choose to buy products and services from.

By placing the power in the hands of the consumer, we are able to offset each individuals daily carbon footprint by driving purchasing decisions thus generating  business development, sales revenue and commercial advantages for those companies who partner with us.

jobs.title: Director of Fundraising
jobs.description:
**Summary**
Project Planet is assembling a founding team to take to market a pioneering commerce platform poised to revolutionise the retail industry. Today every large organisation is aware that climate change is a concern that drives millions, many companies are actively developing marketing initiatives that address these concerns in order to align with this mega trend. However, to date, there is no global initiative that successfully targets the CSR need to be greener whilst driving sales directly. 

That’s exactly the space that the Project Planet platform aims to fill. By partnering with us, companies will be able to influence purchasing decisions of their clients and that of their competitors, whilst enhancing brand value, customer loyalty and perception amongst the ever growing environmentally concerned general public. 

Our consumer platform grants users via its App Carbonquo the possibility to offset their carbon footprint through the daily purchasing decisions they make. The companies they purchase from will foot the bill to offset each user’s carbon emissions. NOW, with Carbonquo every climate change activist, as well as the environmentally concerned general public will be empowered to make change happen by simply going about their everyday lives, choosing those companies that form part of the platform over those who aren’t. 

As a co-founder and the Head of Fundraising, you will play a critical role in bringing the Project Planet initiative to market. From designing and implementing the fundraising strategy, to leading multi-disciplinary fundraising actions working with a wide range of key commercial stakeholders, volunteers and supporters to build the initial funding required, to develop and launch our commerce platform. Your work will build the foundation that ensures the future success of the company.

The founding team will have a breadth of experience in digital product, finance, customer experience, operations, and business development, but more importantly, the team will have a shared passion for building a company. Whether you’ve been a founder before or struggled to take the leap, if you’ve got that entrepreneurial spirit and drive, we’d love to hear from you.

**Opportunity – let’s build this together**

We are looking for founding partners that bring unique set of skills, capable of engineering high potential founding teams in their own specific area of development.

**Who you are**
•	Experienced in setting and successfully implementing innovative fundraising strategies 
•	A proven fundraiser. 
•	Passionate about being a Founder; ready to create a compelling vision to inspire others to join you on your journey
•	Curious, creative and a big-picture thinker
•	A leader and teammate capable of building trust, mutual respect, and helping to curate team culture

**What you bring**
•	Strong knowledge of fundraising, 
•	Depth of experience developing networks of major giving connections
•	Ability to develop a successful short-term fundraising strategy
•	Expertise in devising engaging new funding models and activities

**What you get**
•	Founder’s equity 
•	Base compensation provided by funding after successful 1st round
•	Office space in London

**FAQ**
Q: Do we need previous founding experience to apply? 
Absolutely not! We are seeking first-time founders, would be founders, and successful founders alike, as long as they possess the entrepreneurial spirit and seek the opportunity to build and create. At Project Planet, we do not believe that there is a right or wrong profile for an entrepreneur, as long as you have the passion and drive to succeed...please apply!
